phrases: I am freezing!
I am definitely going to wear a scarf tomorrow.
It gets pretty cold in the evenings now, huh.
Y-Yo.
Hey.
Hey, you!
Do not you go stealing my Miyamura, Tanihara!
I-I am not stealing him from you, jeez!
You guys are so weird!
You are always cuddling with each other and stuff!
S-Sorry, but that is all it is!
We have kind of gotten close lately, that is it!
The hell do you mean, you have gotten close?
Closer than just friends?
Oh, please.
I am not Shindo.
Dude!
W-Wait, really?
Is that what Shindo-kun is to you?
Creak...
W-Wait, really?
Is that what Shindo-kun is to you?
Trembling
W-Wait, really?
Is that what Shindo-kun is to you?
Absolutely not!
C'mon, Tanihara, spill the damn beans!
I mean, I saw Shindo go over to Miyamura's to get a change of clothes once.
Look, he stays over at my place a lot!
Even when I do not want him to!
A wild Shindo appears!
Why are you guys blockin' the sidewalk?
What is going on, huh?
Shindo-kun, are you close with Chika-chan?
Kind Of?
Though lately, she is been busy studying for exams,
so we have not hung out much.
Though I have spent plenty of nights at Miyamura's!
Playing video games.
Though I have spent plenty of nights at Miyamura's!
Though I have spent plenty of nights at Miyamura's!
Hey, Shindo, let us go get some Mickey D's!
Cannot spell burger without Shindo, am I right?!
Wait, what?
Makes no sense, but okay.
Is that free coffee coupon still good?
No, it expired.
Miyamura, I just want you to know something, okay?
I am not worried about girls.
But when I think about some guy taking you, I cannot...
Taking me how?!
Promise me this!
If you fall for someone else, it better be a girl!
No guys, okay?!
O-Okay!
So I had to promise her no guys yesterday.
You guys need to stay away from me, okay?!
Sure, but... what about when you need to use the bathroom?
I just will not go!
Good luck with that, bro.
Horimiya
Man, this is my day off!
You could have gone shopping for art supplies by yourself!
Until the Snow Melts
You could have gone shopping for art supplies by yourself!
Until the Snow Melts
I want to hit up the bookstore, too.
I cannot carry everything by myself.
Or you could just go to the bookstore another day.
Is that you, Yoshikawa-san?
Yanagi-kun?
Whoa, you are wearing glasses!
I thought it was you.
What are you shopping for?
Oh, books and stuff, but mostly art supplies.
Art supplies?
I did not know you were an artist, Yoshikawa-san.
Oh, they are not for me, they are for my sister...
Stare
This is my older sister.
Pleased to meet you, I am Akane Yanagi.
Likewise.
Did not know Yuki was friends with a hottie like you.
Unless you are her boyfriend?
No, madam.
She turned me down.
I figured.
You would not date-
Wait, she turned you down?!
Not the other way around?!
Oh, my God, shut up!
Wait, hold on...
No, I am far out of her league.
Wait, Yuki's league?
This Yuki?
You let this high-class meal go to waste?
You let this high-class meal go to waste?
You can stop looking at me like that!
I hear you loud and clear!
You let this high-class meal go to waste?
Sorry, my sister's such an ass.
It is okay.
This was a pleasant surprise.
I never imagined being able to speak to you outside of school.
Oh, sorry, I should not say that, or Ishikawa-kun will get mad at me.
No, he would not.
You are a good guy, Yanagi-kun.
Toru would not get mad.
I am such a liar.
I hear those two are dating!
Wait, really?
I thought so!
They are always together.
Yeah!
They make a good couple.
I know that Kono-san is totally fooled.
Fooled?
Kono-san thinks Toru and I are dating, right?
Does she?
I have no idea.
She sorta asked me about it yesterday,
and I told her we were dating.
Why could not I just tell her the truth?
What is wrong with me?
Did you want to talk to me to see if I would tell her the truth?
Yeah.
I will stay quiet about it if you admit that you have a crush on Ishikawa-kun.
That is not fair.
What is not fair about it?
You are the one being unfair, do not you think?
She is right.
This is not fair to her.
I lied to Kono-san, knowing it would hurt her.
I am...
I would never seen someone is lips tremble like that before.
Remi-chan, I...
The truth is...
Okay.
Thanks, Yuki-chan.
I know this will not last forever.
I know Toru does not like me that way.
We should have stopped pretending that very same day.
But he holds my hand.
He is nice to me, even when I do not deserve it.
If I asked you to keep up the act for a while, would you?
Keep pretending, I mean.
Yeah, sure.
Maybe I just want this lie of ours to become something real.
But...
That would never be okay.
Yuki was out today, too.
How many days is that now?
Three?
Four?
I think she is been out all week.
Maybe she is sick.
She would text us back if she were sick.
Right, Toru?
Toru?
Oh, sorry, what is up?
Stop spacing out!
We are talking about Yuki!
Have you gotten any texts back from Yoshikawa-san?
Nope, she is not texting me, either.
Maybe she is dealing with family stuff.
Huh.
We should probably tell her the test is going to cover different stuff now.
Oh, good idea.
How funny would it be if she threw a tantrum over the test stuff?
I do not know if she would throw a whole tantrum.
I hope she comes tomorrow.
Yeah.
C'mon, you need to go to school already.
Are not you worried about your attendance record?
Hello?
I am talking to you!
Ow!
This girl called Hori-san called.
She said you turned off your phone.
Let Me guess, you want something again, huh?
Any time you want something, you never say you want it.
I have no idea why you do this.
There is nothing wrong or embarrassing about wanting something.
But you need decide if you are going to get it or not.
You always end up complaining about it afterwards.
I want a hair clip like hers!
Yuki-chan, you just said you did not want one!
Here, take it.
If you want something, then say so.
You have had this bad habit forever.
Hey, you stopped making those cookies, huh.
That last batch you did was pretty good.
Those pure-white ones, like snow- like your name.
Those were good.
Pure-white, like snow.
Like my name.
12 New Messages
Hori: You are out again today.
Sick?
Hope you are okay.
Most classes were self-study today.
Let Me know if you want to see my notes though.
Toru: You getting my texts?
You are not picking up your phone, either.
We are getting worried.
At least text us!
Hori: I had Miyamura show me how to make cookies today, but my batch came out awful.
He ate some anyways, but ended up in the bathroom for an hour...
I feel bad!
Toru: Kono-san told me she likes me.
Toru: Kono-san told me she likes me.
Toru: Kono-san told me she likes me.
Huh?
Huh?
Huh?
'Sup?
Yuki!
Yoshikawa's back.
Yeah.
She looks good.
Oh, yeah, did I tell you the test's covering different stuff now?
Yeah, I saw your text.
This really sucks.
I guess it is still all stuff I am crap at, though.
Yoshikawa.
Can we talk?
Sure.
This is probably the end of our little game of pretend.
What do you want to talk about?
It is freezing up here; let us make it quick!
I got to give Hori her notebook back, too.
Did you see my text?
Yeah, about Kono-san?
Yeah.
When she told me she liked me...
She told me she did not need an answer.
What?
Wait, she does not?!
Yeah.
For some reason she thinks we are dating,
so she just wanted to get that off her chest.
Why did not you tell her, then?
That we are not dating?
I do not know.
I did not feel like I had to clear up the misunderstanding.
Besides, I promised you I would play along.
So if you did not have to pretend, what would you have told her?
Please, Kono-san's way out of my league.
I would not be good for her.
She will find someone way better than me.
O-Oh.
Guess that means no more sakura cookies, huh.
Yeah.
I totally thought he would go for her, what with how nice she is.
You have not made me any of those burned cookies lately, Yoshikawa.
O-Oh, shut up.
I do not burn them anymore.
I am a bad person.
Kono-san made him cookies every day, worked up the courage to talk to him,
and told him how she felt, even knowing she would be rejected.
But all I do is run away.
I am relieved that he is not going to date her,
but the possibility of him not reciprocating my feelings
makes me too scared to breathe.
Even still, I...
I want to be the one at Toru's side.
I am so selfish.
If she is warm Sakura cherry blossoms...
then I am just gross, muddy, freezing snow, just like my name.
I can see your breath.
I hear today's going to be the coldest day of the year.
If it is going to be this cold, it could at least snow.
We did not get much snow last year.
I was looking forward to some this year.
Nobody wants it to snow.
You think so?
It is so pretty, though.
Sure, it is pretty, but only in the beginning.
Shoveling it is a huge pain, and you can slip and fall.
Yeah, I can see Miyamura slipping.
Yeah.
FLOP
Yeah.
Yeah.
And the gross muddy snow sticks around for so long.
Nobody likes that.
Everyone just waits for it all to melt in the spring.
The snow does not melt just because it is spring.
Huh?
The snow melts because it decides to melt on its own.
No matter how badly everyone wants it to stick around,
the snow makes its own decision to melt.
That is why it melts.
You got that?!
I-It melts because it gets warmer.
So you think the snow melts because the sakura blossoms ask it to?
What is this guy talking about?
Sounds like you need to go back to first-grade science.
E-Excuse me?!
I cannot believe he can say all that with a straight face.
Still, it makes me happy.
You are so goddamn stupid, Toru.
Not as stupid as you, Yoshikawa.
That is the first time you have smiled all day.
How did you know?
I just know.
It is freezing out here.
Let us head in.
And whose bright idea was it to come up here in the first place?
Yeah, I know.
Your hand's warm.
I really hope we get some snow!
The pure-white kind.
Huh?
You think Sakura got a boyfriend?
Yeah, only because she seems a lot happier as of late.
It is the exact opposite.
Huh?
Okay, I am off to tutoring!
Okay, later.
Wait, what is the exact opposite of getting a boyfriend?
Or was she talking about her not being happy?
Sengoku-kun?
Why are you cleaning?
The eraser bits on the floor were bothering me.
You should let the first-years handle that!
C'mon, now.
She is definitely in better spirits.
Almost like a weight's off her shoulders now.
And you should open the window if you are going to clean.
Where is Remi?
She had tutoring today.
Remi always opens the window.
That is why I forgot.
Thanks.
H-Hey, did something change for you lately, Sakura?
You seem happier, but I do not think it is because something good happened...
I mean, I hope it was not anything, but...
Sorry, I am overthinking this, are not I?
Sakura?
Huh?
Oh, I am heading home.
Sorry I cannot help you clean.
Hold on, Sakura!
What...
What happened?
Nothing happened.
I got rejected before I even had a chance to ask him out.
That is it.
That is all it is.
What a moron.
He is got to be stupid.
Who is the idiot who did not want to be with you?
He should be expelled for that.
Am I right?
Sakura-
That was the first time I ever saw someone in my grade break down and sob.
It only hurts more because nobody's in the wrong.
It started snowing.
Next Time: It May Seem Like Hate
